mapper.select: SELECT bno,content,subject,nickname,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,likes,reply,num FROM (SELECT bno,content,subject,nickname,regdate,hit,likes,reply,rownum as num FROM (SELECT bno,content,subject,nickname,regdate,hit,likes,reply FROM COMMUNITY ORDER BY bno DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(bno, subject, content, regdate, hashtag, id, nickname) VALUES(co_bno_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, #{hashtag}, #{id}, #{nickname})
